name: Rowland's Adventure
description:
Rowland's Adventure is a short and cute puzzle platformer with some crazy physics. Taking inspiration from Mario Galaxy, you jump around and between various planetoids to reach the end! Some parts may be difficult but I promise it is completable. Keep in mind that timing matters. Don't forget to look up and have fun!

This is my first ever game jam! I made the mistake of choosing to make a 3D game, so I had very little time to make actual levels and assets after I got everything working, but I'm still incredibly proud of what I got done! I'm super happy to have this baseline to maybe make a proper game out of sometime. Thanks for playing!

Vision of Persistence by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4592-vision-of-persistence
